s: So, I had a visit to some local fabric shops, and bought my first sewing machine. With the encouragement of my mum, she taught me everything I needed to know about sewing. A week later, Daisy was running around in the first Happy Hound bandana, and there it began.

We've made the difficult decision to close down. After my mum (the second owner of this business) was diagnosed with terminal cancer, I tried my best to keep the business going. After some really difficult decisions, I have decided to say goodbye to Happy Hounds.
